name: Wandering in the maze
description:
You play as an immortal character, his life never ends. When facing an enemy, you will find yourself at the beginningof the path.

All enemies have a limited field of view. Each enemy has a different speed.

Tip: you can lead the enemy to a dead end and die, so the enemy will no longer interfere with you. But be careful, some enemies are sent to the beginning after colliding with you.
